paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the KCNH2 gene variants, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Experiments with E-4031 and the protein synthesis inhibitor cycloheximide suggested that pharmacological correction promotes the trafficking of G601S stored in this compartment.

functional_data.summary: Pharmacological correction promotes the trafficking of G601S stored in the transitional ER.

variants.additional_notes: The variant G601S is associated with impaired trafficking of Kv11.1 channels.
key_quotes: Loss-of-function KCNH2 mutations cause the type 2 long QT syndrome (LQT2).
Pharmacological correction promotes the trafficking of LQT2 channels stored in this compartment.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data extracted from the main text.
